backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing collections, products, and contact messages with CRUD-style methods and query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing added static aesthetic clothing images and related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to descriptive summaries of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, shop, product detail, about, and contact, wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Collecti: UI card for displaying a collection with image, description, and button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: UI card linking to product detail showing image, availability badge, price, and tags.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Controlled contact form with validation, error display, and submission via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand mark, navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with brand logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper rendering header, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch collections and products through the actor, including filtered and single-item queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactMutation.ts: Defines mutations for submitting contact messages and retrieving stored messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client setup, identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode variants, typography, and background textures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying company philosophy, craftsmanship, sustainability, and vision sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with submission feedback and displays company contact info, hours, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing a hero section, featured collections, new products, and various promotional sections fetched via catalog hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays a detailed product page with loading and error states, showing images, pricing, availability, tags, description, and variant options.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Renders the main shop view with product and collection data, filters by collection, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, features, required imagery, and architectural notes for building the clothing brand website.
